boons.name: Heartbreak Strike
boons.description: Your Attack deals more damage and inflicts Weak.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Heartbreak Flourish
boons.description: Your Special deals more damage and inflicts Weak.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Crush Shot
boons.description: Your Cast is a wide, short-range blast that inflicts Weak.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Range: 300
  • Weak Duration: 3 Sec.
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Passion Flare
boons.description: Your Cast damages foes around you and inflicts Weak.
boons.prerequisites: Unique to Aspect of Beowulf

boons.name: Passion Dash
boons.description: Your Dash inflicts damage where you end up, inflicting Weak.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Aphrodite's Aid
boons.description: Your Call fires a seeking projectile that inflicts Charm.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Dying Lament
boons.description: When foes are slain, they damage nearby foes and inflict Weak.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Wave of Despair
boons.description: After you take damage, damage nearby foes and inflict Weak.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Different League
boons.description: Resist some damage from nearby foes' attacks.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Life Affirmation
boons.description: Any or chamber rewards are worth more.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Empty Inside
boons.description: Your Weak effects have a longer duration.
boons.prerequisites: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, or Heartbreak Flourish

boons.name: Sweet Surrender
boons.description: Weak-afflicted foes are also more susceptible to damage.
boons.prerequisites: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, or Heartbreak Flourish

boons.name: Broken Resolve
boons.description: Your Weak effects are more potent.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.
boons.prerequisites: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, or Heartbreak Flourish

boons.name: Blown Kiss
boons.description: Your Cast shoots farther and is stronger against undamaged foes.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • Cast range is doubled and is also 30% wider.
boons.prerequisites: Crush Shot

boons.name: Unhealthy Fixation
boons.description:
Your Weak effects also have a 15% chance to Charm foes.
  • Charm Duration: 4 Sec.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, or Heartbreak Flourish
  • Empty Inside, Sweet Surrender or Broken Resolve

boons.name: Curse of Longing
boons.description:
Your Doom effects continuously strike Weak foes.
  • Successive Hit Damage: 50%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Aphrodite: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, or Heartbreak Flourish
  • Ares: Curse of Agony or Curse of Pain

boons.name: Heart Rend
boons.description:
Your Critical effects deal even more damage to Weak foes.
  • Bonus Critical Damage vs. Weak: +150%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Aphrodite: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, or Heartbreak Flourish
  • Artemis: Deadly Strike, Deadly Flourish, or True Shot

boons.name: Parting Shot
boons.description:
Your Cast gains any bonuses you have for striking foes from behind.
  • Bonus Backstab Damage: +25%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Aphrodite: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish, or Aphrodite's Aid
  • Athena: Divine Strike, Phalanx Shot, Divine Flourish, Divine Dash, or Athena's Aid

boons.name: Cold Embrace
boons.description:
Your Cast crystal fires its beam directly at you for 4 seconds.
  • Bonus Cast Damage: +30%
boons.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Crystal Clarity
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Aphrodite: Heartbreak Strike, Passion Dash, Heartbreak Flourish, or Aphrodite's Aid
  • Demeter: Crystal Beam

boons.name: Low Tolerance
boons.description:
Your Hangover effects stack even more times against Weak foes.
  • Bonus Hangover Stacks: 3
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Aphrodite: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, or Heartbreak Flourish
  • Dionysus: Drunken Strike, Drunken Flourish, Drunken Dash, or Dionysus' Aid

boons.name: Sweet Nectar
boons.description:
Any Poms of Power you find are more effective.
  • Bonus Lv. from Poms: +1
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Aphrodite: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish, or Aphrodite's Aid
  • Poseidon: Tempest Strike, Tempest Flourish, Flood Shot, Tidal Dash, or Poseidon's Aid

boons.name: Smoldering Air
boons.description:
Your Call charges up automatically, but is capped at 25%.
  • Auto Gauge Gain: 1% every .2 seconds
boons.notes: • Cannot be combined with Sigil of the Dead
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Aphrodite: Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish, Crush Shot, Passion Dash, or Aphrodite's Aid
  • Zeus: Lightning Strike, Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, Electric Shot, or Zeus' Aid

curse.name: weak
curse.description: For at least 3 Seconds, victim deals at least 30% less damage.
